item.title: Millennials Are Finally Joining the Ranks of 401(k) Millionaires
item.description: New Fidelity data shows a record 654,000 Americans have $1 million or more saved in their 401(k)s.

item.title: Shop Like a Pro This Holiday Season With These Money-Saving Tips
item.description: Simple strategies to avoid overspending as shoppers face inflation, tariffs and rising holiday pressures.

item.title: Current Mortgage Rates: November 21, 2025
item.description: Freddie Mac's benchmark rate for a 30-year fixed-rate mortgage averaged 6.26% for the week ending November 20, a slight increase from a week ago.

item.title: What Happens to Student Loans if Trump Shuts Down the Education Department?
item.description: The administration's latest actions aimed at dismantling the Education Department don't affect student loans.
